title: Four Truths and a Lie About a Soccer Histogram
question_text:
Lionel needed to collect data and produce a histogram for math class. Because he loves soccer, he decided to keep track of the total number of goals scored during a random sample of professional soccer games. Lionel's histogram is shown below.
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

Which of the following statements is NOT justified by the information provided in the histogram?

choices.text: The distribution is slightly skewed right.

The median number of goals scored was
4
.

In
2
3
of the games sampled, fewer than
5
goals were scored.
